title: puck2
author: puck2
content: I reset my lightning node. I didn't realize it would force close all of the open channels. All of them have closed except for one. All that is listed is the remote public key. This has been stuck open, in the state "closing" for weeks now. I think it is causing funds to be stuck in my wallet. Is there any way to move this channel closing along?

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Did you create a backup before you reset it? Are you using CLN or LND? If you have a backup there may be some utilities you can try depending on a few things. Take a look here for LND: https://github.com/lightninglabs/chantools and https://docs.lightning.engineering/lightning-network-tools/lnd/disaster-recovery-Dave
